General.Name: Cemepe Investimentos S.A.
General.Description: Cemepe Investimentos S.A., through its subsidiaries, manages its own and third-parties' resources. It also provides technical, financial, and administrative assistance services. The company was formerly known as Companhia Marcopolo de Participações and changed its name to Cemepe Investimentos S.A. in April 1993. Cemepe Investimentos S.A. was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil. Cemepe Investimentos S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Cemisa Participações Ltda.
General.Address: Praça Tiradentes, 10 - Sala 304, Rio De Janeiro, RJ, Brazil, 20060-070
